So dieee!\""},{"lineNumber":103547,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":" "},{"lineNumber":103548,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　＜ズボオォォーッ！＞","translatedEnglishLine":"   <Swoosh!>"},{"lineNumber":103549,"originalJapaneseLine":"「のわあぁぁあーーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No waaahhh!\""},{"lineNumber":103550,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わあ……笑顔のまま落ちた……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wow... he fell with a smile on his face...\""},{"lineNumber":103551,"originalJapaneseLine":"「く、くぉら、シィルーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"H-hey, Syiru---!\""},{"lineNumber":103552,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、え？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh, huh?"},{"lineNumber":103553,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス様の言う通りの場所に掘りましたけど……","translatedEnglishLine":"I dug at the spot that Lord Rance told me to..."},{"lineNumber":103554,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、あ……そうだったかも……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, ah... maybe that’s true...\""},{"lineNumber":103555,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、主の行く先を見定めて、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, you should have gauged where the master would go,"},{"lineNumber":103556,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前の方で調整せんかー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"and adjusted it on your end!\""},{"lineNumber":103557,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む、無理ですよー……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I can’t do that...\""},{"lineNumber":103558,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぬおおおおー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nuuuooooh!"},{"lineNumber":103559,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こ、こうなったら先に上がった方が勝者だー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"If that’s the case, the one who gets out first is the winner!\""},{"lineNumber":103560,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こ、この戦いはいったい……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Th-this battle, what on earth is—"},{"lineNumber":103561,"originalJapaneseLine":"　我らは一体なにを見ているのでしょう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"What exactly are we watching...?\""},{"lineNumber":103562,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わ、分からん……なにも分からん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I don’t understand... I don’t understand anything...\""},{"lineNumber":103563,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うう、ランス様……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, Lord Rance..."},{"lineNumber":103564,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私、なんだか恥ずかしいです……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I’m somehow embarrassed...\""},{"lineNumber":103565,"originalJapaneseLine":"「護衛〜？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Guards—?\""},{"lineNumber":103566,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、しばらく一緒にいさせて頂きます」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, we will stay with you for a while.\""},{"lineNumber":103567,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだってまた……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What now again...?"},{"lineNumber":103568,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス殿は立場に比してあまりに無防備である、","translatedEnglishLine":"Lord Rance is far too defenseless for his position,"},{"lineNumber":103569,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もし良ければ頼めないでしょうか……","translatedEnglishLine":"If possible, could we entrust his protection to you...?"},{"lineNumber":103570,"originalJapaneseLine":"　と、クリーム殿に言われました」","translatedEnglishLine":"That is what Lady Cream said.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「総統とリック将軍……
いったいどちらが強いんでしょう……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Which one is truly stronger, I wonder...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ、な……
だが、話に聞く限りは達人同士の……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But from what I've heard, it's a battle between masters...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 壮絶な戦いになるのは間違いあるまい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It will undoubtedly be a fierce and extraordinary fight."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「見逃さないようにしておけ……
どちらが勝つにせよ、
中々見られないものになるぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It will be something rarely seen."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 赤い死神の戦いを一目見ようと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Soldiers of the Red Army gathered around, eager to catch a glimpse of the battle of the Red Death,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 周囲に集まった赤軍の兵士達も、
固唾を呑んで見守っていた。
「参る！」
空気すら斬り裂くような裂帛の気合い、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a piercing battle cry that seemed to cut through the very air,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リックが矢のような速度でランスに迫る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rick lunged at Rance with arrow-like speed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ズボオォォーッ！＞
「ああっ！？」
ランスに向かうことだけを考えていたリックは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rick, focused solely on attacking Rance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 為す術もなく、穴に落ちていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: had no way to avoid falling into a trap hole.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははははは！
やーいやーい、引っかかったー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ha ha, you fell for it!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うわぁ、落とし穴だ！　ランスさん、最低！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wow, a pitfall! Rance, you’re the worst!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やかましいぞ、サチコ！
勝った奴が勝利者だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The one who wins is the victor!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははは！　というわけで死ねーーー！」
＜ズボオォォーッ！＞
「のわあぁぁあーーーー！」
「わあ……笑顔のまま落ちた……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wow... he fell with a smile on his face..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「く、くぉら、シィルーーー！」
「え、え？
ランス様の言う通りの場所に掘りましたけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I dug at the spot that Lord Rance told me to...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え、あ……そうだったかも……」
「いや、主の行く先を見定めて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, you should have gauged where the master would go,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前の方で調整せんかー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and adjusted it on your end!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「む、無理ですよー……」
「ぬおおおおー！
こ、こうなったら先に上がった方が勝者だー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If that’s the case, the one who gets out first is the winner!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こ、この戦いはいったい……
我らは一体なにを見ているのでしょう……」
「わ、分からん……なにも分からん……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-I don’t understand... I don’t understand anything..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うう、ランス様……
私、なんだか恥ずかしいです……」
「はい、しばらく一緒にいさせて頂きます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, we will stay with you for a while."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだってまた……」
「ランス殿は立場に比してあまりに無防備である、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance is far too defenseless for his position,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もし良ければ頼めないでしょうか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If possible, could we entrust his protection to you...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と、クリーム殿に言われました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That is what Lady Cream said."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The one who wins is the victor!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もし良ければ頼めないでしょうか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If possible, could we entrust his protection to you...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と、クリーム殿に言われました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That is what Lady Cream said."
